articles.title: Experts reflect on a decade of Wild Polio-Free Certification for the South-East Asia Region - India - ReliefWeb
articles.description: News and Press Release in English on India about Health and Epidemic; published on 27 Mar 2024 by GPEI
articles.content:
Interviews with four experts
On 27 March 2014, India was officially certified wild polio-free. This pivotal moment not only marked a triumph for the country itself, but as the last country battling … [+12732 chars]
